mapper.select: insert into ingredients(ingrerdientsNum,nutrient,ingredientsName,ingredientsUnit, calory,image,content,unit) values (ing_seq.nextval,#{nutrient}, #{ingredientsName}, #{ingredientsUnit}, #{calory},#{image, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{content},#{unit})
SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM ingredients
SELECT ingrerdientsNum, nutrient, ingredientsName, ingredientsUnit, calory, image, content,unit FROM ingredients WHERE ingrerdientsNum = #{ingrerdientsNum}

SELECT tb.* FROM ( SELECT ingrerdientsNum, image FROM ingredients
AND (ingrerdientsNum > #{ingrerdientsNum})
ORDER BY ingrerdientsNum ASC ) tb WHERE ROWNUM=1

SELECT tb.* FROM ( SELECT ingrerdientsNum, image FROM ingredients
AND (ingrerdientsNum < #{ingrerdientsNum})
ORDER BY ingrerdientsNum DESC ) tb WHERE ROWNUM=1

insert into exerciseInfo(exerciseNum, exerciseType, exerciseName, unitTime, lossCal, video, pic, unit) values(exercise_seq.nextval, #{exerciseType}, #{exerciseName}, #{unitTime}, #{lossCal}, #{video, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pic}, #{unit})
select exerciseType, typeName from execiseType
SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM exerciseInfo i join execiseType t on i.exerciseType = t.exerciseType

SELECT exerciseNum, i.exerciseType, exerciseName, unitTime, unit, lossCal, typeName, video,pic FROM exerciseInfo i join execiseType t on i.exerciseType = t.exerciseType
WHERE exerciseNum = #{exerciseNum}

SELECT tb.* FROM ( SELECT exerciseNum, exerciseName FROM exerciseInfo i join execiseType t on i.exerciseType = t.exerciseType
AND (exerciseNum > #{exerciseNum})
ORDER BY exerciseNum ASC ) tb WHERE ROWNUM=1

SELECT tb.* FROM ( SELECT exerciseNum, exerciseName FROM exerciseInfo i join execiseType t on i.exerciseType = t.exerciseType
AND (exerciseNum < #{exerciseNum})
ORDER BY exerciseNum DESC ) tb WHERE ROWNUM=1
mapper.insert: insert into informationd(infoNum, subject, content) values (information_seq.nextval, #{subject}, #{content})
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM informationd

SELECT tb.* FROM ( SELECT infoNum, subject FROM informationd
AND (infoNum > #{infoNum})
ORDER BY infoNum ASC ) tb WHERE ROWNUM=1

SELECT tb.* FROM ( SELECT infoNum, subject FROM informationd
AND (infoNum < #{infoNum})
ORDER BY infoNum DESC ) tb WHERE ROWNUM=1
mapper.update: UPDATE informationd SET subject=#{subject}, content=#{content} WHERE infoNum = #{infoNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO todayexer(edate,exerciseNum,infoNum,userid) VALUES (to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd'), (SELECT exerciseNum FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RN, exerciseNum FROM (SELECT exerciseNum FROM exerciseInfo ORDER BY DBMS_RANDOM.random())) WHERE RN = 1), (SELECT infoNum FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RN, infoNum FROM (SELECT infoNum FROM informationd ORDER BY DBMS_RANDOM.random())) WHERE RN = 1), #{userId})
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM todayexer
